data.title: The Nobel Prize
data.meta_description: Tonight I am heavy with wealth and honour – yes indeed, but I am lacking in the most important thing of all, the only thing, I am lacking in youth. Regardless of what I should do now – regardless of what would be most appropriate – I raise my glass to all that is young, to the young of Sweden, to the young everywhere! (From Hamsun’s speech at the Nobel Prize Banquet, 1920)
